reviewText: A sexy and suspenseful action flim , its main theme is revenge and seduction. David Bradley kicks ass as the hero  , he gets action as a excessive force cop and has a ladies man. I purchased movie this movie after seeing the trailer on one my old vhs tapes and I said to myself that looks like a entertaining flick & guess what it was. It you love action, sex, and revenge plot this is your movie.

Anna Levine,one of my favorite female actors in Outside the law. One of her best movies but in my opinion her best. All through the film she comes off as a seductive cold blooded killer and the movie does not disappoint in mystery and suspense. A decent steamy sex scene that anna does very well and looks good doing it,I would recommend this to all anna levine fans or mystery/thriller genre fans anywhere.
